english.segment1: I would like to see. Differently. I would like to walk. Like I talk. Would like to breathe. The air that I need. Would like some bread. Although I've just been fed
english.segment2: I wish that I could stop. Playing superman. I have decided to let the case drop. I'm not superman
english.segment3: With my hands I can do. Fake food. With my hands I can drown. All your sounds. With my hands I sometimes think. That I can do. Just like You. With my hands I can make. Mistakes
